Ensure you have your local directory and: Ensure you have your local directory and remote directory set to the same project path in order for this to work effectively, you may also want to enable the Compare Local / Remote Directories feature.
See which local files / folders require: See which local files / folders require uploading or remote files / folders require downloading. This option works well with Synchronized Browsing.
Sync connection with your account or dis: Sync connection with your account or disable to only have this connection available on this device. We use Diffie Hellman Elliptic Curve encryption for all sensitive data using a public / private key combination that's only available to your account.
Store all connection logs locally and sh: Store all connection logs locally and show all history within the connection log window.
This displays information, actions, erro: This displays information, actions, errors and success messages to and from the server in which you are connected to.
This displays the queued files / folders: This displays the queued files / folders waiting to transfer, as well as the files / folders that have either failed or completed to transfer.
This displays your local directory view: This displays your local directory view in a treeview structure, starting from your root path up to the folder your currently active in.
This displays your servers directory vie: This displays your servers directory view in a treeview structure, starting from your root path up to the folder your currently active in.
